backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister with authorization mixin, topic and subtopic models, user profiles, interval logic, and CRUD/query functions for topics, intervals, schedules, and user settings.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature-to-file mappings and evidence metadata for two UI features related to date-based dashboards and subtopic revision navigation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten short summaries of all major frontend files, including components, utilities, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and global styles using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication flow, initial loading, profile setup modal, theme provider, and dashboard routing.
frontend/src/components/CalendarView.tsx: Renders a monthly calendar showing study and revision events with de-duplication, difficulty coloring, and navigation between months.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying attribution text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with branding, theme toggle, and login/logout logic integrated with Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter their name and saving the profile via a backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/SettingsView.tsx: Manages user study interval settings with editable difficulty-based intervals and preferred review days, loading defaults and saving updates.
frontend/src/components/SubTopicSchedule: Displays a subtopic’s study date and planned revision schedule with status indicators inside a dialog.
frontend/src/components/TodayView.tsx: Shows overdue and due-today subtopics for a selected date and allows triggering a review update.
Displays details for a main topic and lists active and completed subtopics with access to each subtopic’s revision schedule.
frontend/src/components/TopicDialog.tsx: Provides a dialog for creating or editing main topics and subtopics, including difficulty and study date settings.
frontend/src/components/TopicsView.tsx: UI for listing, expanding, editing, viewing, scheduling, and deleting main topics and subtopics using query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and handling login/logout states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating topics, schedules, and user profiles via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with extensive CSS variables defining light and dark theme tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Tab-based dashboard switching between Today, Topics, Calendar, and Settings views.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Utility functions for converting ICP Time, comparing dates, and generating normalized date keys.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routes), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL or session.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, current issues, architectural notes, and lists existing and new feature requests for the study scheduling app.
